dialogue_info.dialogue:
Why, if it isn't my favorite junk drawer!
Need anythin' from this old man?

Your store's full of junk, hows about you take some of MY forgotten trinkets?
My room's starting to get crazy cramped.
HAH! Missy, I already told you, I'm tryin' to get RID of my junk, not collect more!
Well, it was worth a shot.
